meanings.definition: a type of medication used to treat depression
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed trazodones to help with her sadness.
meanings.sent2: She takes trazodones every morning to feel better.
meanings.sent3: The trazodones danced in her stomach, chasing away the gloom.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a storm until the trazodones calmed the waves.
meanings.sent5: The bottle of trazodones was a beacon of hope in her dark days.

meanings.definition: the plural form of trazodone, a drug used to treat anxiety and insomnia
meanings.sent1: The pharmacy ran out of trazodones, causing a panic among patients.
meanings.sent2: He bought trazodones to help him sleep better at night.
meanings.sent3: The trazodones partied in his cabinet, waiting for their turn to help.
meanings.sent4: In the silence of the night, the trazodones whispered sweet dreams to him.
meanings.sent5: The trazodones were like tiny sleep fairies, sprinkling restful nights on those in need.
